content:
tschneidereit opened PR #1908 from update-object-and-wast to master:

This somewhat cuts down on duplicate dependencies. wast is used in a much older version (11.0.0) by witx, and can be updated without issues there as well, but this at least gets us from 3 copies to 2.

  • [ ] This has been discussed in issue #..., or if not, please tell us why
    here.
    This hasn't been discussed, it's just a bit of maintenance.

  • [x] A short description of what this does, why it is needed; if the
    description becomes long, the matter should probably be discussed in an issue
    first.

  • [ ] This PR contains test cases, if meaningful.
    n/a

  • [x] A reviewer from the core maintainer team has been assigned for this PR.
    If you don't know who could review this, please indicate so. The list of
    suggested reviewers on the right can help you.
